assetTypes.title: Asset Types
assetTypes.description: Configure and enable different types of assets available on the platform. Once enabled, asset types cannot be disabled.
assetTypes.allEnabled: All available asset types have been enabled.
assetTypes.enabledDescription: These asset types are currently active and available for use on the platform.
assetTypes.confirmEnableDescription: This action cannot be undone. Once enabled, this asset type will be permanently available on the platform.
